name: Video Game Ideas Generator
description:
This video game is a video game that generates procedurally video game ideas.

  • Click in idea for change it.
  • Includes a Sanity button that give some coherence in the generated ideas.
  • Includes a Log that stores the generated ideas.

Future plans:

  • Multi-languages.
  • More variants of generated ideas.
  • Add ideas categories selection (rpg, shooter, strategy, etc).
  • Improve interface.
